org.pac4j.play

Class StorageHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pac4j.play.StorageHelper

  • public final class StorageHelper
extends Object
    This class is an helper to store/retrieve objects (from cache).
    Since:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    Jerome Leleu
